title: Svelte Skill Streak
descLong: The project is about an AI learning companion based on ChatGPT V.3. It's possible to set an event date a learning topic and a daily learning effort. You'll then get questions fetched form ChatGPT regarding the selected learning topic. The app is also connected to the Unsplash API to display a topic based random background image every day. The project is work in progress, therefore no live version is available at this time. The project was completely made with Svelte Kit. This is a collabo project with Ben Petermann

title: Fussball unter der Lupe
descLong: The goal was to create the most simple, responsive Landingpage to order a book. The whole project was done with Vue.js in combination with Express.js and Google Cloud Functions

title: 22 Pictures
descLong: The goal was to showcase different categories of photos and also some personal information alongside a contact form to get in touch. The Frontend was completely created with HTML, CSS and class based Vanilla Javascript. The backend was made with PHP and a MySQL database. The costumer also got an custom CMS to upload photos in existing or new Albums.

title: Vue Inn Booking Platform
descLong: A component based practice Project for booking hotel rooms. It's possible for Users to register or login to reuse their personal data for future bookings or if already registered check their booking history. Users ar able to view different rooms and their features. The users can check the availability of the chosen room and get instant feedack if or if not the room is available.

title: DoomDubberz.com
description: Landingpage for a personal music project
descLong: The goal was to promote a new album of a personal music project. It's as plain as it can get and supports to preview all tracks as well as basic band info. It's only made for get in contact with labels and give them a convenient option to preview the music.
